entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A bug between <RuntimeFrameworkVersion> and runtimeconfig.json includedFrameworks version #31836
  • Wrong "workload not found" message #31835
  • Self-contained app with Trim unused code selected trims used code #31832

PullRequests

Created

  • Update dependabot to run on 4xx #31837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable dotnet.js fingerprinting for .NET 8 #31829
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.12.1 to 19.12.3 in /eng/dependabot #31828
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx

Merged

  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.12.1 to 19.12.3 in /eng/dependabot #31827
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Update CSS parser version #31809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31808
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add optional logging to MSBuild SDK Resolver #26904

Updated

  • Updating the minimum VS version #31720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet sln: Add error message for misplaced solution argument #18608
    Area-CLI
  • Prevent restore loop in VS #31798
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #31519
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow `dotnet sln list` to display solution folder paths #18502
    Area-CLI
  • Register off-by-default analyzer: configuration binding generator #31654
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, .NET 8.0
  • Add IsAotCompatible flag to enable all analyzers and IsTrimmable #31766
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Add `-aot` parameter to the console template #31739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
